user-story.name: Show list of tasks for current user

tag.name: Show list of tasks/Show list of tasks for current user

test-step.description: Given There are 5 tasks, 0 of them assigned to the current user
When I show the list of tasks
Then I see a message "no task is currently assigned to you"
